Hey You!

If you came here looking for support for my app, I've got a couple FAQs for you!


My favourite lightbulb doesn't work with this, what gives?

Unfortunately, this app only works by taking advantage of the fact that the specific lightbulbs I'm using is pretty loose-y goose-y with what can write to it. Since every manufacturer is different, there isn't a great way for me to account for all the different bluetooth enabled light bulbs


This looks familiar, I think I've seen this before...

First of all, this isn't a question, but you're also right! All credit for the idea comes from this fantastic tweet. This blog post was also a huge help in finding a suitable light bulb!


Is there a way I can make this work with my favourite lightbulb?

Maybe! You can find the source code for this project here. Feel free to fork it and tinker with your own light bulb. If you get it to work, submit a PR and maybe we can include it in the app!
